TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEquatable`1<T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IEquatable

span.span: The type of objects to compare.

summary.span: 定義通用的方法，實值類型或類別會實作這個方法，以建立特定類型的方法來判斷執行個體是否相等。

span.span: Defines a generalized method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific method for determining equality of instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面是由型別，其值可以相等 （例如，數字和字串對於類別而言）。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be equated (for example, the numeric and string classes). 實值類型或類別會實作方法來建立特定類型的方法適合用來判斷執行個體是否相等。A value type or class implements the method to create a type-specific method suitable for determining equality of instances. > [!NOTE] > 介面會定義方法，可判斷實作的型別執行個體的排序次序。The interface defines the method, which determines the sort order of instances of the implementing type. 介面會定義方法，可判斷是否相等的實作類型的執行個體。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 介面由泛型集合物件例如， ，和在之類的方法中的等號比較測試`Contains`， `IndexOf`， `LastIndexOf`，和`Remove`。The interface is used by generic collection objects such as , , and when testing for equality in such methods as `Contains`, `IndexOf`, `LastIndexOf`, and `Remove`. 它應該實作可能會儲存到泛型集合的任何物件。It should be implemented for any object that might be stored in a generic collection. ## Examples 請參閱範例的方法。See the example for the method.

para.span: 取代的型別參數介面會實作這個介面的型別。

span.span: Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface.

para.span: 如果您實作，您也應該覆寫的基底類別實作和使其行為與一致方法。

span.span: If you implement , you should also override the base class implementations of and so that their behavior is consistent with that of the method.

para.span: 如果您不要覆寫，靜態的呼叫中也呼叫您覆寫的實作類別上的方法。

span.span: If you do override , your overridden implementation is also called in calls to the static method on your class.

para.span: 此外，您應該多載和運算子。

span.span: In addition, you should overload the and operators.

para.span: 這可確保所有相等測試傳回一致的結果。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results.

para.span: 如需覆寫，請參閱發行項。

span.span: For information on overriding , see the article.

para.span: 對於實值類型，您應該一律實作並覆寫以提升效能。

span.span: For a value type, you should always implement and override for better performance.

para.span: 方塊實值類型和依賴反映來比較兩個值相等。

span.span: boxes value types and relies on reflection to compare two values for equality.

para.span: 這兩個實作和覆寫應該傳回一致的結果。

span.span: Both your implementation of and your override of should return consistent results.

para.span: 如果您實作，您也應該實作如果可以排列或排序類型執行個體。

span.span: If you implement , you should also implement if instances of your type can be ordered or sorted.

para.span: 如果您的型別實作，您幾乎也實作。

span.span: If your type implements , you almost always also implement .

para.span: 請注意，有一些設計支援類型的順序關聯性，但等號比較可能是不同的順序關聯性。

span.span: Note that there are some designs where a type supports an order relation, but equality may be distinct from an ordering relation.

para.span: 請考慮`Person`類別其中依字母順序排序。

span.span: Consider a `Person` class where you sort alphabetically.

para.span: 具有相同名稱的兩個人員排序相同，但不是同一人。

span.span: Two people with the same name sort the same, but are not the same person.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(!T other) cil managed
Public Function Equals (other As T) As Boolean

param.name: other
param.span: 要與此物件進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with this object.

summary.span: 指出目前的物件是否等於另一個相同類型的物件。

span.span: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.

returns.span: 若目前的物件等於 參數，則為 ，否則即為 。

span.span: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法是要執行的測試與另一個類型的物件是否相等`T`，與目前物件相同的類型。The implementation of the method is intended to perform a test for equality with another object of type `T`, the same type as the current object. 方法會在下列情況下呼叫：The method is called in the following circumstances: - 當`Equals`方法呼叫和`other`引數是類型的強型別物件`T`。When the `Equals` method is called and the `other` argument is a strongly-typed object of type `T`. (如果`other`的類型不是`T`，基底方法呼叫。(If `other` is not of type `T`, the base method is called. 兩個方法，提供稍微較佳的效能。)Of the two methods, offers slightly better performance.) - 呼叫泛型集合物件的數字的搜尋方法的時機。When the search methods of a number of generic collection objects are called. 這些類型和其方法如下：Some of these types and their methods include the following: - 某些泛型多載的方法。Some of the generic overloads of the method. - 搜尋方法的類別，包括， ， ，和。The search methods of the class, including , , , and . - 搜尋方法的類別，包括和。The search methods of the class, including and . - 搜尋方法的泛型類別，包括和。The search methods of the generic class, including and . 換句話說，若要處理類別的物件，將儲存在陣列或泛型集合物件中的可能性，最好實作使物件可以輕鬆地識別和操作。In other words, to handle the possibility that objects of a class will be stored in an array or a generic collection object, it is a good idea to implement so that the object can be easily identified and manipulated. 當實作方法，定義適用於泛型型別引數所指定之類型的相等。When implementing the method, define equality appropriately for the type specified by the generic type argument. 例如，如果型別引數是，定義適用於比較的兩個 32 位元帶正負號的整數相等。For example, if the type argument is , define equality appropriately for the comparison of two 32-bit signed integers. ## Examples 下列範例示範的部分實作`Person`類別可實作且具有兩個屬性：`LastName`和`SSN`。The following example shows the partial implementation of a `Person` class that implements and has two properties, `LastName` and `SSN`. 方法會傳回`True`如果`SSN`兩個屬性`Person`物件是相同的; 否則它會傳回`False`。The method returns `True` if the `SSN` property of two `Person` objects is identical; otherwise, it returns `False`. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/EqualsEx2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/EqualsEx2.vb#3)] `Person` 物件然後儲存在物件，並可以藉由識別`Contains`方法，如下列範例所示。`Person` objects can then be stored in a object and can be identified by the `Contains` method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/Snippet12.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/Snippet12.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果您實作，您也應該覆寫的基底類別實作和使其行為與一致方法。

span.span: If you implement , you should also override the base class implementations of and so that their behavior is consistent with that of the method.

para.span: 如果您不要覆寫，靜態的呼叫中也呼叫您覆寫的實作類別上的方法。

span.span: If you do override , your overridden implementation is also called in calls to the static method on your class.

para.span: 此外，您應該多載和運算子。

span.span: In addition, you should overload the and operators.

para.span: 這可確保所有測試相等，都傳回一致的結果範例所示。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results, which the example illustrates.
